Mr Gbagbo. The opposition premier Guillaume Soro on Tuesday informed operators of coffee-cocoa and banks not to pay taxes to the`` illegitimate government of Mr Gbagbo''. All amounts paid under these operations will be considered not received by the State of C?te d'Ivoire and will remain due , he concluded. coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed!
